name: Create ServiceM8 clients from Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new Google Sheets row is added, Make will automatically create a new client in ServiceM8. This example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
